q: Young of Richmond thinks Mike Pence made the right decision. "My hope is that he runs for governor. I think it's rather fortuitous that it's open at this particular time," Young said. I think it's obvious that he wants to serve in perhaps a higher capacity. Young, who has met with Mike Pence locally and in his Washington, D.C., office, said Mike Pence would do well if elected governor, but Indiana would miss his presence in Congress.

the powerful Lakers. Michael Jordan late flurry silenced the Staples Center and unceremoniously ended Los Angeles' run at a perfect postseason. "Anybody that bet on it, some broke people out there," Allen Iverson said. I'm glad nobody didn't bet their life on it'cause they definitely would be dead right now. Instead, the Sixers-- double-digit underdogs-- are very much alive as they again displayed their heroic heart. "Our guys just try hard," Sixers coach Larry Kwame Brown said. Everything you've done to these dogs, something bad needs to happen to these guys." Nevermind any other angle, here.
